contentrichtext.text: {{Multiple issues|orphan = May 2008|one source = February 2012|no footnotes = February 2012}} '''Daniel Lesueur''' was the [[nom de plume]] of '''Jeanne Lapauze''', née '''Loiseau''' (1860 - 1920), a [[France|French]] [[poet]] and [[novelist]]. She was born in [[Paris]]. Her volume of poems, ''Fleurs d'avril'' (1882), was crowned by the [[Académie française]]. She also wrote some powerful novels dealing with contemporary life: *{{Lang|fr|''Le Mariage de Gabrielle''}} (1882) *''Un Mysterieux Amour'' (1892), with a series of [[philosophy|philosophical]] [[sonnet]]s. *''L'Amant de Geneviève'' (1883) *''Marcelle'' (1885) *''Une Vie tragique'' (1890) *''Justice de femme'' (1893) *''Comedienne Haine d'amour'' (1894) *''Honneur d'une femme'' (1901) *''La Force du passé'' (1905) Her poems were collected in 1895. She published in 1905 a book on the [[economics|economic]] status of [[women]]: ''L'Evolution feminine''; and in 1891-1893 a two volume [[translation]] of the works of [[Lord Byron]], which was awarded another [[literary prize|prize]] by the Académie. Her ''Masque d'amour'', a five-act [[Play (theatre)|play]] based on her novel (1904) of the same name, was produced at the [[Théâtre Sarah Bernhardt]] in 1905. She received the ribbon of the [[Legion of Honor]] in 1900, and the [[Prix Yitet]] from the French Academy in 1905. She married in 1904 [[Henry Lapauze]], a well-known writer on [[art]]. ==References== *{{1911}} ==External links== *[http://www.archive.org/search.php?query=mediatype%3A(texts)%20-contributor%3Agutenberg%20AND%20(subject%3A%22Lesueur%2C%20Daniel%2C%201860-1920%22%20OR%20creator%3A%22Lesueur%2C%20Daniel%2C%201860-1920%22%20OR%20creator%3A%22Daniel%20Lesueur%22%20OR%20title%3A%22Daniel%20Lesueur%22%20OR%20description%3A%22Daniel%20Lesueur%22) Works by or about Daniel Lesueur] at [[Internet Archive]] (scanned books original editions color illustrated) {{Authority control|VIAF=39520913}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Lesueur, Daniel | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 1860 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 1920 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Lesueur, Daniel}} [[Category:1860 births]] [[Category:1920 deaths]] [[Category:Writers from Paris]] [[Category:19th-century French writers]] [[Category:20th-century French writers]] [[Category:French poets]] [[Category:French women novelists]] [[Category:French women writers]] [[Category:Pseudonymous writers]]
